ShaderNodePreset.Description:
This Matchbox generates a a bar that moves with a sinusoidal movement.
Demo: https://vimeo.com/80257415
Contact us at dev@cpgp.nu if you want us to customize or create new shaders for you!
Parameters: - Sin Speed: change the speed of the sinusoid - Sin Pos X axis : change sin X position Based on http://glsl.heroku.com/e#12457.0 License Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License
ShaderNodePreset.Name: CPGP_Sin
